name: 許嘉裕
objective:
This Course aims to explain the funddmental of machine learning, including the concept and algorithms, and applications in industry. The main contents include:
1. Learning Theory of Machine Learning 
2. Machine Learning Algorithms
3. Tree-based models
4. Induction-based models 
5. Neural network models
6. Trem project and hands-on labs
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Machine Learning
Week 2: Holiday
Weel 3: Supervised Learning 
Week 4: Unsupervised Learning
Week 5: Deep Neural Network
Week 6: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)
Week 7: Holiday
Week 8: Case Studies
Week 9: Case Studies
Week 10: Case Studies
Week 11: Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)
Week 12: Presentation of Midterm Term Project 
Week 13: Generative adversarial network (GAN)
Week 14: Hands-on Labs
Week 15: Hands-on Labs
Week 16: Holiday
Week 17-Week 18: Presentation of Final Term Project
scorePolicy:
Assignment: 30%
Midterm term project: 35%
Final Term project: 35%
